channel.title: linqpad on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in linqpad on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 12: Kentico Kontent Headless CMS and JAMStack - with Matt Nield
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by good friend Matt Nield, who also co-runs the .NET Oxford user group with me. We chatted about the Kentico Kontent headless CMS, static websites and the JAMStack - plus much more! Links from the show Matt’s links Matt’s website Matt on Twitter Kentico Kentico main website Kentico Kontent Kentico Xperience (previously Kentico EMS): Kentico Kontent extended 3-month trial offer from Matt Other links from the show JAMStack HttpClient Interceptor LINQPad Matt’s YouTube video on using Kentico Kontent with LINQPad Statiq .

item.title: Episode 11: LINQPad with Joseph Albahari
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Joe Albahari, author of one of my favourite software development tools - LINQPad! This is a tool that I use on a daily basis, and it saves me so much time! So I especially enjoyed chatting with Joe about the many features of LINQPad, his experiences when developing it, and also future plans. Links from the show LINQPad Joe’s website Joe/LINQPad on Twitter LINQPad Tips and Tricks blog post series: Part1, Part2, Part 3 Writing a Neural Net from Scratch talk Pushing C# to the limit talk (alarm clock reference) .
